abilities.name: Wash Out
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water or Fighting Energy attached to 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Swampert is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hammer Arm
attacks.effect: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck.
